      • getInterpreterValue

        public int getInterpreterValue()
         The script interpreter to use to run the script. If no interpreter is
 specified the script is executed directly, which likely
 only succeed for scripts with
 [shebang lines](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shebang_\(Unix\)).
        .google.cloud.osconfig.v1beta.SoftwareRecipe.Step.RunScript.Interpreter interpreter = 3;
        Specified by:
        getInterpreterValue in interface GuestPolicies.SoftwareRecipe.Step.RunScriptOrBuilder
        Returns:
        The enum numeric value on the wire for interpreter.
